title: Commuters Risk Data Breaches With Careless Work Habits On Public Transport
content: A recent survey by Kaspersky highlights the careless work habits of UK commuters using public transport, revealing that many engage in risky activities like writing important emails and discussing confidential information aloud.
summary: A recent survey by Kaspersky highlights the careless work habits of UK commuters using public transport, revealing that many engage in risky activities like writing important emails and discussing confidential information aloud.

title: Husband Of Russia's Richest Woman Arrested On Murder Charge
content: Vladislav Bakalchuk, the estranged husband of Russia's richest woman, was arrested and charged with murder on Thursday, his lawyers said, after a deadly shootout at the Moscow office of Russia's largest online retailer.
summary: Vladislav Bakalchuk, the estranged husband of Russia's richest woman, was arrested and charged with murder on Thursday, his lawyers said, after a deadly shootout at the Moscow office of Russia's largest online retailer.

title: Mossad Set Up A Shell Company, Sold Rigged Pagers To Hezbollah: Report
content: Pagers and walkie-talkies, considered outdated modes of communication, were weaponised for a one-of-its-kind attack in Lebanon, resulting in a series of explosions for two consecutive days, killing 32 and injuring over 3,000 across the country.
summary: Pagers and walkie-talkies, considered outdated modes of communication, were weaponised for a one-of-its-kind attack in Lebanon, resulting in a series of explosions for two consecutive days, killing 32 and injuring over 3,000 across the country.

title: The Winding, Fitful Path To Weight Loss Drug 'Ozempic'

title: Instagram's "Peace Of Mind" Changes For Teen Accounts: Will It Work?

title: US Airline Apologizes After Cabin Pressure Problem Injures Passengers
content: US airline Delta apologized on Thursday after a recent flight had to make an emergency landing due to a cabin pressure problem, with local media reporting the incident caused passengers to bleed from the nose and ears.
summary: US airline Delta apologized on Thursday after a recent flight had to make an emergency landing due to a cabin pressure problem, with local media reporting the incident caused passengers to bleed from the nose and ears.

title: A 120-Feet Airplane-Sized Asteroid Makes A Close Flyby Of Earth

title: Trump Claims He's Meeting PM Modi During US Visit, Foreign Ministry Says...

title: "Completely Unwarranted": India On US Court Summons Over Khalistani Terrorist
content: A US court's summons to Indian government over Khalistani terrorist Gurpatwant Singh Pannun's civil suit, alleging a plot to murder him, was "completely unwarranted", Ministry of External Affairs has said.
summary: A US court's summons to Indian government over Khalistani terrorist Gurpatwant Singh Pannun's civil suit, alleging a plot to murder him, was "completely unwarranted", Ministry of External Affairs has said.

title: Study Finds Air Pollution Top Risk Factor For Brain Stroke
content: The study showed that coupled with air pollution, high temperatures as well as metabolic disorders, fuelled a significant rise in global cases and deaths due to stroke in the last three decades.
summary: The study showed that coupled with air pollution, high temperatures as well as metabolic disorders, fuelled a significant rise in global cases and deaths due to stroke in the last three decades.

title: Israeli Man Arrested Over Iranian-Backed Plot To Assassinate Netanyahu

title: How Pager Attack In Lebanon Has Stoked Fears Of Israel-Hezbollah War
content: Since Hezbollah has reduced the use of mobile phones by its forces because Israel can easily detect and target them, pagers have increasingly become the preferred messaging device within the group.

title: Instagram Has Announced It Will Remove Beauty Filters - But Damage Is Done

title: US Woman Fighting For Life After Vaccine Reaction At Hospital
content: Within ten minutes of receiving the vaccines, Alexis Lorenze experienced symptoms, including temporary blindness, a locked jaw and vomiting.
